entry.string: Unable to create gap in tree for comment insertion! Comments table has possibly been corrupted.
entry.translation: Tidak dapat mencipta jurang dalam pokok untuk sisipan komen! Jadual komen berkemungkinan telah rosak.

entry.string: Please seek help on the public-developer list xaraya_public-dev@xaraya.com, or in the #support channel on Xaraya's IRC network.
entry.translation: Sila dapatkan bantuan di senarai public-developer xaraya_public-dev@xaraya.com, atau dalam canel #support di rangkaian IRC Xaraya.
